item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, February 27, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Goodbye K-9 Mail (72 points | 7 comments)
4. EA Open Sources Command and Conquer: Red Alert (82 points | 29 comments)

8. Show HN: Probly – Spreadsheets, Python, and AI in the browser (83 points | 11 comments)

11. A data analysis of speeches at the Oscars (63 points | 4 comments)

20. Bitmovin (YC S15) Is Hiring Interns in Software Engineering in Austria ( | hide)

22. Altitude estimation of RF interference sources via interferometric corrections (5 points | discuss)
23. Winners of the $10k ISBN visualization bounty (517 points | 58 comments)

25. Time Warp: Delayed-choice quantum erasure (68 points | 59 comments)
26. TypeScript types can run DOOM [video] (1230 points | 326 comments)
27. Gene Hackman has died (110 points | 98 comments)
28. Nigerians are building affordable alternatives to AWS and Google Cloud (51 points | 15 comments)
29. iMac G4(K) (392 points | 155 comments)
